av.sd.iter <- apply(M.COUNT.N,1,function(x) sqrt((NRUN-1)/NRUN*var(x)))
> av.sd.iter
  [1] 0.48280431 0.49638695 0.49839743 0.50000000 0.49638695 0.48989795 0.46249324 0.49355851 0.43301270 0.45376205 0.43301270 0.46249324

> count2 <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6,16,26,36,46)
